strengths: Exceptional adaptability with multiple viable strategies
Non-Euclidian Shielding is one of the best faction techs
Munitions Reserves pairs well with large fleets
weaknesses: Risk of being perceived as threatening by the table
Winning space combats doesn't score points — not having enough infantry is the real weakness
tips: Multiple viable approaches: aggressive planet focus, tech accumulation, massive fleets, or economy building
Install a second space dock in your home system early
Use Munitions Reserves efficiently with large fleets of smaller ships
Emphasize friendship and diplomatic alliance value — your reputation as a threat works against you
Infantry is your Achilles' heel; never neglect ground forces

techPaths.name: Blue + Red (with skip)
techPaths.note: Strong aggressive path if you have a red skip
